name: Panda
description: A rebuild on my site to newer versions of JS, code is shorter and easier to read.  The project name is just a random word-pair.  There is no execute script here as this code is integated into another project.   I wrote all the tests in src/tests before I executed this code.

scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production; node ./node_modules/.bin/vite --config ./vite.config.lib.ts build && node ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs ./dist/ob1.mjs -o /tmp/ob1.min.mjs && echo 'generated /tmp/ob1.min.mjs' ; node node_modules/.bin/vite --config vite.config.lang-go.ts build ; node node_modules/.bin/vite --config vite.config.lang-bash.ts build ; node node_modules/.bin/vite --config vite.config.lang-conf.ts build ; node node_modules/.bin/vite --config vite.config.lang-html.ts build ; node node_modules/.bin/vite --config vite.config.lang-js.ts build ; node node_modules/.bin/vite --config vite.config.lang-php.ts build ; node node_modules/.bin/vite --config vite.config.lang-xml.ts build ; node node_modules/.bin/vite --config vite.config.lang-sql.ts build ; node node_modules/.bin/vite --config vite.config.lang-ts.ts build ; node node_modules/.bin/vite --config vite.config.lang-perl.ts build ; node node_modules/.bin/vite --config vite.config.lang-css.ts build
scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=development; node ./node_modules/.bin/vitest --typecheck run; if [ ! -d './dist/tests' ]; then echo 'Run build:tests first'; else; export NODE_ENV=development; node ./tools/tests-browser.mjs; fi
scripts.#ignore-lint-notes: 1 function is over complexity by 1 point. . .  && Its an arbitary limit
scripts.build:docs: if [ ! -d './dist/docs' ]; then mkdir -p ./dist/docs; fi; node ./node_modules/.bin/typedoc --options ./typedoc.json --emit both --logLevel 3
scripts.#ignore-this-line: Edit values in this simple script if you have local security policy
scripts.#ignore-this-line2: NOTE: 'build:docs' after 'build' and 'test:web', as they purge the dist directory
scripts.docs: if [ ! -d ./dist/docs ]; then echo 'Build docs first'; else; node ./tools/doc-server.mjs & fi
scripts.build:tests: export NODE_ENV=web-test; node ./node_modules/.bin/vite -c vite.config.tests.ts build; echo 'add more tests'
scripts.test:web: if [ ! -d './dist/tests' ]; then echo 'Run build:tests first'; else echo 'If running manually, use CLI flags'; export NODE_ENV=development; node ./tools/tests-browser.mjs; fi
